name: Classic Beef Stew Seasoning (3pk)
summary: On a cool winter day, there’s nothing more comforting than a rich and hearty bowl of stew. This one-pot, big-batch blend makes it easy to get the flavor just right with a thick gravy and meltingly tender beef and veggies. Perfect for weekend get-togethers, après ski, or an easy set-it-and-forget-it meal on a busy weeknight!
